inclusion.criterion: Be 45 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be a Tis, T1, N0 M0 - American Joint Committee Classification
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have negative surgical margins (NSABP definition) after final surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Should have adequate skin spacing between balloon surface and surface of the skin (>=7mm)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Be pregnant or breast-feeding. (If appropriate, patient must use birth control during the study)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have extensive intraductal component (Harvard Definition,>25% DCIS)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 42-year-old healthy woman with no underlying disease, regular exercise and no history of allergies. She is married for 5 years and uses barrier methods of contraception.
